Texts.Chs: ...因为在这种行为中，你会 发现自己陷入了可怕的困境。这种堕落被神谕本身所废除，因此被认为是Mantizi公民可能犯下的最严重的罪行。所以在购买白柄扫帚之前请记住这一点。
Texts.Eng: ...for in such an act, you will find yourself in dire trouble. Depravity of this sort is abolished by the Oracles themselves, and as such is considered among the worst crimes possible by Mantizi citizens. So bear that in mind before buying a white-handled broom.
A legal treatise of the Mantizi species.
